titles.title: A bill to extend the period during which chapter 12 of title 11 of the United States Code remains in effect and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1151-1152)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

bill.summary: 2/3/1993--Introduced. Amends the Bankruptcy Judges, United States Trustees, and Family Farmer Bankruptcy Act of 1986 to: (1) postpone from October 1, 1993, to October 1, 1998, repeal of provisions concerning the debt adjustment of a family farmer with regular annual income; and (2) modify the guidelines for court-authorized extension of the filing period for bankruptcy plans by a family farmer.
